entities

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Conversation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a linked system of Messages exchanged between two Accounts.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Conversation

        public Conversation(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> participants,
                    int initialMessage)
        Creates an instance of Conversation based on ArrayList of participant usernames and initial Message ID.
        Parameters:
        participants - given Account usernames that can send messages to this Conversation
        initialMessage - the first Message ID of the Conversation
